thread.title: Five Star Professional Recognizes Amy Nelson of Keller Williams Fox Valley Realty as a 2015 Five Star Real Estate Agent Winner
thread.title_full: Five Star Professional Recognizes Amy Nelson of Keller Williams Fox Valley Realty as a 2015 Five Star Real Estate Agent Award Winner

author: Five Star Professional Representative
title: Five Star Professional Recognizes Amy Nelson of Keller Williams Fox Valley Realty as a 2015 Five Star Real Estate Agent Winner
text:
Five Star Professional is pleased to announce Amy Nelson, Keller Williams Fox Valley Realty , has been chosen as one of Chicago’s Five Star Real Estate Agents for 2015. Five Star Professional partnered with Chicago magazine to recognize a select group of Chicago area real estate agents who provide quality services to their clients. Less than 7 percent of real estate agents in the area were selected. Amy Nelson will be featured, along with other award winners, in a special section of the October issue.
“I have been in the real estate business 16 years and specialize in first time homebuyers, move-ups, short sales, relocation and empty nesters. I am truly grateful to have received this honor three years running! My clients are not only my clients, but have become friends as well and are the true essence of my business,” Amy Nelson of Keller Williams Fox Valley Realty says.
The Five Star Real Estate Agent award program is the largest and most widely published real estate agent award program in North America. Agents are measured using an objective, in-depth research methodology with significant focus on customer feedback and overall satisfaction.
“It is a great achievement for me to have been selected for this award by my clients and peers. This award tells me I continue to strive to do my best every day and exceptional customer service is a must in my business! I got in this profession to not only help people achieve their dreams, but to help them move on to their next chapter in their lives. So rewarding! I will continue to give top-notch service and value to all of my clients, and look forward to working with each and every one of them!” Amy says.
“Five Star Professional’s research is extensive, with more than 10 million consumers, peers and other stakeholders contacted each year. We are relentless in our efforts to identify those professionals with the utmost standard of excellence,” says Jonathan Wesser, Research Director, Five Star Professional.
Amy Nelson’s Five Star award profile can be viewed here .
About the research process:
Now entering its 13th year, Five Star Professional conducts in-depth, market-specific research in more than 45 markets across the United States and Canada to identify premium service professionals.
Five Star Professional contacts thousands of recent homebuyers to identify award candidates. Phone, mail and online respondents rate their real estate agent on 10 satisfaction criteria. Candidates with a qualifying client satisfaction rating move on to be evaluated on objective criteria such as experience, production levels and disciplinary and complaint history. Real estate agents do not pay a fee to be considered or awarded. For more information, visit http://www.fivestarprofessional.com .
